channel.title: ESOTERICA.MC -- new [PVP] [FACTIONS] server
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/DNuwQ.png[/img][/center] [center] We are esoterica.mc, a brand new pvp/factions server - killing/stealing/griefing allowed. INSTANT HEALTH FOOD!! No lag, 99.9% up-time!
Our only rules are that you don't hack, x-ray, cry and whine.
IP Address: 108.163.227.203:25574
Website: http://www.esoterica-mc.net/[/center] [center]Forums: http://forum.esoterica-mc.net/
Plugins: Border, Essentials, Permissions, Anti-PVPLOG, Factions, FastFood Admins: harley_quinn, BlockBeast719
Come join us. ;][/center]
